title: Beekeeper Singed price
body: Is beekeeper singed going to be with 1350 or 975 RP ?

replies.body: It should be free with how much they are jerking us around on it's release... still not out...
It was delayed a release due to a bug. We wanted to fix the bug, as opposed to releasing a broken skin. :) *He's also out now!*

Hello Katey

I noticed over the last two years the vast majority of skins are in the 1350RP price tear (with 975RP being mostly release* and esports skins, and a few stand-alone skins): https://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/skins?sort_type=release_date&sort_order=&champion_id=&skinType=&is_available=
The only 750RP skins released in the last year were Renektoy, Super Kennen, the "D&D" and Worldbreaker sets, and the "cooks" skins that came out with Pantheon. 
I want to make clear that I think skins have become better and better over the last 2-3 years, especially in the 1350RP tier, but it seems like it has become the new standard skins price tier, with 750RP skins being very seldom (now that I think of it, maybe they have an overlap with chromas?). Do we have to expect less 750RP skins going forward?

Thank you ^_^


*and about release skins, i thought those had a fixed price of 975RP even if they often had more features than a standard 975RP-skin, did that change too? (see kayn, rakan, xayah,...)
If i remeber correctly surrender@20 had it at 1350
